name: optionality
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`optionality` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-optionality).

provider.description:
The provider type for the optionality package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

o1.description: A computed integer. This should be optional.

o2.description:
A computed or maybe user provided integer. This should be optional, since both the user and the provider can choose to
not fill it.

o3.description: A maybe user provided integer. This should be optional.

r1.description: A user provided integer. This should be required as an input and output.

o2.description:
A computed or maybe user provided integer. This should be optional, since both the user and the provider can choose to
not fill it.

o3.description: A maybe user provided integer. This should be optional.

r1.description: A user provided integer. This should be required as an input and output.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Res resources.

r1.description: A user provided integer. This should be required as an input and output.
